original_text: Blind Pharisee! First clean the inside of the cup and dish, and then the outside also will be clean.
korean_text: 눈 먼 바리새인이여 너는 먼저 안을 깨끗이 하라 그리하면 겉도 깨끗하리라

sentences.original_text: First clean the inside of the cup and dish,
sentences.korean_translation: 먼저 잔과 접시의 안을 깨끗이 하고

sentences.original_text: and then the outside also will be clean.
